5. Mio-kun no Houkago (澪くんの放課後); Koushoku Shounen Vol.9
6. Kokoro-kun no Nayamigoto (こころくんの悩みごと); Koushoku Shounen Vol.6
7. Yukino-kun no Suki na Hito (雪乃くんの好きなひと); Koushoku Shounen Vol.5
8. Moriya-kun no Gohoubi (森谷くんのごほうび); Koushoku Shounen Vol.4
9. Arashi-kun no Okurimono (嵐士くんのおくりもの); Futaket 12.5 (2016-10-08)
